quiz.question: Which brand is historically linked with the classic trench coat?

Which fashion house launched the younger line Miu Miu?
Which year did Christian Dior officially found the House of Dior?
Which brand commissioned the first large-scale fashion show at the Palais de Tokyo in the 1970s?
Which luxury house produces the Birkin handbag?

Which couture firm requires members to present at least twenty-five original pieces during collection season?
options: Haute couture houses under Chambre Syndicale
quiz.answer: Haute couture houses under Chambre Syndicale
